review:
2 surgeries have been done by dr kishan rao and we are waiting for another 2 surgeries to be done for my elder sister.
WE have heard a lot about the dr and the best part about him which i feel is, he believes in himself and always explains the problem accurately.
He shares only the necessary information.
I am sure he will rock the next 2 surgeries also.
Hoping to see my sister's hand setting in the next few days under his control.

review: ** ** *** ** *** **** **** *** ***** ******* ** ********* *** ****** *** ****** ** ****** *** ********** ****** ******* ** **** *** ***** ** ********* *** ******* **** ********* * Dr. Kishan Rao motivates and boosts the confidence level of the patient whenever the patients is lying low and in pain. Thank You Dr. Kishan Rao.

My husband got operated by Dr. Kishan Rao. ** ** ** ********* ******* I would like to recommend this doctor. Treatment was good, everything went well. He is quite friendly, I was really very scared when was in operation, he calmed me down and he is really good. I am quite happy with the explanation of health issue, we are quite satisfied with the doctor.
